resources.string: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
Test your knowledge of the movie
Stop! Who approaches the Bridge of Death must answer me these questions four, \'ere they reach the other shore.
Name one of the knights who joins King Arthur in his quest
What is the name of the magician the knights talk to about the killer rabbit?
Which limbs did King Arthur cut off the Black Knight in their battle?
Am I worthy to cross the Bridge of Death?
